Reviews.Title: great to do business with
Reviews.Author: MARK JOHN FREUND
Reviews.Content: easy transaction - responsive when questions were asked - very accomodating when it came to an issue with availability - no problems at all

Industry Leader in Superior Video Display! DSC G Series DVR also leads remote viewing revolution with the most advanced technology supporting all smart phone monitoring system in the world!

Intelligent 3G/GPRS Mobile Phone Surveillance: Symbian, Windows Mobile, JAVA, IPhone, Blackberry, Android
CMS (Central Management System) supports unlimited DVR/ cameras with PTZ controls.
SATA devices supported. GUI with 32bit True Color
